tool.name: CalculateDischarge

param.name: dam_in_features
param.dialogReference: The point features that represent the storage structures.

param.name: pipe_type_field
param.dialogReference: This field contains the type, if present, of outlet pipe/culvert for the storage structure. Valid values are 'No pipe', '18 inch CMP', or '24 inch CMP'. It is optional in the case where the storage structure has no discharge pipe.

param.name: pipe_slope_field
param.dialogReference: This field contains the fractional pipe slope (ft/ft). It is optional in the case where the storage structure has no discharge pipe.

param.name: pipe_height_field
param.dialogReference: This field contains the height in feet of the pipe above the bottom of the storage structure. It is optional in the case where the storage structure has no discharge pipe.

param.name: spillwayType
param.dialogReference: This field contains the spillway type of the storage structure. Valid values are 'Sharp-Crested Weir' and Broad-Crested Weir'. If the input features of this tool are the product of the Pond Charactertization Tool > A. Identify and Characterize Existing Storage tool, this field should be 'Spill_Type'.

param.name: spillway_width_field
param.dialogReference: This field contains the spillway width in feet of the storage structure. If the input features of this tool are the product of the Pond Charactertization Tool > A. Identify and Characterize Existing Storage tool, this field should be 'Spill_Wdth'.

param.name: spillway_height_field
param.dialogReference: This field contains the spillway height in feet of the storage structure. If the input features of this tool are the product of the Pond Charactertization Tool > A. Identify and Characterize Existing Storage tool, this field should be 'Spill_Hgt'.

param.name: summaryTable
param.dialogReference: This field contains the location of the attribute table containing the Stage-Volume-Discharge relationship of the storage structure. The attribute table must contain numeric 'stage', 'volume', and 'discharge' fields. The discharge field will be updated based on discharge calculations made from the selections in this tool. If the input features of this tool are the product of the Pond Charactertization Tool > A. Identify and Characterize Existing Storage tool, this field should be 'SummaryTbl'.

tool.summary: This tool will use the the attributes of the input features to calculate the stage-discharge relationships for each feature. The spillway and pipe input fields selected in the tool should be populated prior to tool execution.
